title: Privacy Policy
intro: Your privacy matters. This page explains what data I collect and how I use it.

data.heading: Data collected
data.paragraph: I only collect the data necessary when you contact me through the contact form (name, email, subject and message). I do not store sensitive information on this public site.

use.heading: How I use your data
use.paragraph: The data you send is used solely to respond to your inquiry. I do not process or share your data with third parties unless required to fulfill your request or by law.

cookies.heading: Cookies & tracking
cookies.paragraph: This site uses minimal cookies for analytics and theme/language preferences. I do not store personal data in cookies. You can disable cookies in your browser.

external.heading: External links
external.paragraph: The portfolio may include links to external services (e.g. repos or demos). I am not responsible for those sites' privacy practices; check their policies directly.

rights.heading: Your rights
rights.paragraph: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your data by emailing me. I will respond as soon as possible.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.paragraph: If you have privacy questions, contact me at

note: You can also use the contact form
